text: The Lawyer is a 1970 American courtroom drama movie directed by Sidney J. Furie and starring Harold Gould, Barry Newman, Diana Muldaur, Robert Colbert, Kathleen Crowley, Michael Murphy. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney J. Furie
title: The Lawyer (movie)
